website_summaries.verdict: Its low-profile styling is a big draw, as is its weather-resistance. Setting the modes is a bit of a chore, but reliability makes up for this.
pros: Charges fully, even in low/partial sunlight
cons: Must charge for at least 2 days prior to first use
Some users feel there aren’t enough screws to ensure a secure mount

customer_reviews.title: Very decent quality.
customer_reviews.text: It puts out good light and isn't blindingly bright. Stays on just long enough for me to unlock my door and go inside. They look nice too. I will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: B. Auppl

customer_reviews.title: Prefect!
customer_reviews.text: Needed light next to my grill for when me and my wife grill at night and it works perfectly, and exactly as described. I like the different modes and it's brightness.
customer_reviews.author: billie-joe

customer_reviews.title: Great Motion Sensor Solar Lights!
customer_reviews.text: This solar light is very impressive. The photo doesn't do justice it is pretty bright. Glad I got this!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Sensor light
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these. They worked for about 3 months. Both do not work any more. I've checked and replaced the batteries but the unit won't turn on in any mode. I've charged the new batteries in my flashlight charger so I know they are fully charged. Motion detection worked okay for the short period these units worked.
customer_reviews.author: Computer Geek

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two, one broke in less than 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and LOVED them. They felt sturdy, they worked perfectly, and they were a breeze to install. But now, less than two weeks after putting them up, one just continuously flashes during the day and won't come on at night and the button no longer does anything. I'll update my review if I hear back from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Harkness

customer_reviews.title: Works flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: The light works flawlessly. It is very bright and lasts all night on dim mode. The solar panels are larger than similar lights and the product seems robust and weatherproof. It seems it will last for years to come. (I will update review if that changes). I installed on my backyard deck. It provides a dim light during the night and a brighter light whenever it detects someone walking under it. Installation was a breeze, it only needs a screw or nail to snap it on. I can take it out to use it as a portable flashlight in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador Vallejo

customer_reviews.title: I like to order things on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I like to order things on Amazon, but this is the worst product I've ever bought, and I read a lot of comments that are good, so I ordered one, but it just broke down after working for two days, probably It is my bad luck, I hope this kind of thing do not happen again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slow to react, stopped working after a few days.
customer_reviews.text: These would be a lot better if there was an additional mode: Dusk til dawn, with motion ON. It has a similar setting, but it leaves the lights on dim all the time, which drains battery. The other issue is how slow these are to react to motion. Mine doesn't come on until I pass it. The light also ramps up instead of flipping on. This makes it even worse. UPDATE: After 4 days, the light stopped working. It might come on a couple times and then run out of battery. The light is mounted to a north facing wall, so this is probably the issue. But I hoped the solar panel would charge it enough to work.
customer_reviews.author: Adam A.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and buy something else.  Units both had electrical connection issues.
customer_reviews.text: electrical connection issues- both units I bought wouldn't work when mounted. I would note that they were taking a charge because when they were touching the ground, both units would light up nicely, but every time they were lifted off the ground and mounted they wouldn't work. Threw them out.
customer_reviews.author: S. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to installing after purchasing last year. Looks like nice solid unit. Unfortunately it doesn’t work! Made in China
customer_reviews.author: Russell Peck

customer_reviews.title: Very bright light! I was impressed at how much ...
customer_reviews.text: Very bright light! I was impressed at how much light projected from these. I plan on buying a couple more. 5 stars for me!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy C Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good instructions, easy to install and puts out surprising ...
customer_reviews.text: Good instructions, easy to install and puts out surprising amount of light. Offers three options for lighting. I didn't want lighting for all night or extended periods of time. The remaining option was triggered by motion and turned on more than adequate light. My only wish was that this third option lighting would have stayed on for more than 40-50 seconds as it was illuminating a lengthy area that included steps. Also, the lights were a bit slow to come on in reaction to the motion. If these limitations are not an issue for your application, this is a perfect product independent of battery replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Queen

customer_reviews.title: dead within a week
customer_reviews.text: The solar light worked well for only a couple of days, and now it just lights up once at night and seems dead afterwards. I'm not sure if the battery doesn't last long, or it is sensor problem. Disappointed since I spent quit some effort to install it for some a short period for it to work. Consider returning. update 11/14/2018: bumping up to 4 star. Since last comment, the seller sent me a replacement which worked well, without me even asking. Nice service.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Won't come on
customer_reviews.text: Would not come on. Sat in sun for a week. Opened and checked rechargeable battery, fully charged. Tried the mode button many times in the dark. Did nothing. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Lariet442

customer_reviews.title: quit working about a month (second item quit working , too)
customer_reviews.text: It worked OK for one week....then seemed like the dim light got dimmer....., so I switched to only motion detection.... now again the dim light is almost NON existent..... The motion detection is very delayed and has a narrow angle.... I got a second item sent. This time I kept indoors, gets a lot of sunshie. It worked exactly 4 weeks and then just quit working at all. I now have 2 plastic boxes, filled with toxic chemicals. They work for a month then die. Total waste of money!!!! Get a wired motion detector/lamp and do NOT further pollute the environment with these useless gadgets. SAD
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: This light is better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This light is better than I expected, I bought 4 from other brands before, which are more expensive than this one. Other than that, this is super easy to install, only took me like 5 minutes. It doesn’t have any details about the lumen, but I’ll say it’s should be at least 6500-1000, super bright, super easy to install, and most importantly, super cheap. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lyu

customer_reviews.title: Great as a exterior security deterrent.
customer_reviews.text: Recently we have had issues of kids messing around with homes attempting to break in. My side laundry window is in a area that is extremely dark and provides great cover for anyone who wants to lurk. After installing this light above my window I have startled several who felt they could freely attempt to gain entry to my home. Best part is due to the lack of light my home cameras were unable to make out faces or details. With this light they have been clearly identified from video and provided to the investigator handling the cases regarding all these incidents.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great Light
customer_reviews.text: This solar light does everything that the seller says it does. This is one of the better solar light that I have had/have and is very easy to use. The location I have it in only gets light during the am and up to mid afternoon. I have it set on the number 2 setting which is the "only turn on when someone passes by" and it is more than enough to keep the light bright. It is easy to mount and all parts needed are supplied. It lights a large area, more so than most walkway lights, more like a mini-security light. I plan on getting a few more in the future
customer_reviews.author: M. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: A total disappointment: worked for one day only!
customer_reviews.text: I followed all the instructions and waited more than 48 hours after installation before turning it on and setting up the functions. When the light first turned on, I was very happy how bright it was. Then throughout the first night (until I stopped monitoring it) the light kept coming on without any triggering motion. Then the light didn’t come on the following evening. It was dead!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Great light! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase! This light is extremely bright. I was very impressed with how bright it is. I charged it (just took one day of sunshine) and turned it on. I tested it on the 2nd floor balcony and it lit the entire downstairs driveway area. Still have to test the range of the motion sensor once it is installed, but so far that seems to be good as well. Great light... very pleased. May get another one to replace my light on the front porch.
customer_reviews.author: Ozbo

customer_reviews.title: False Alarms
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, but I mounted one about 7' above a thru-the-wall air conditioner and found when the AC was running the light came on and off constantly. Apparently the hot air coming out the back of the AC was affecting it, because if I shut the AC off the light stopped coming on. I bought a second one and mounted them a few feet east and west of the AC and don't have the problem anymore. It will also come on and off during a heavy rain, but overall I'm satisfied with the lights. They are mounted 11' feet up on the house and will sense a person walking 15' from the house and come on.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, very bright no wires to run
customer_reviews.text: Another day another solar light for me, this iThird motion sensor solar light is really good, very bright, a breeze to install, it work great, has 330 lumens, it has 3 modes the dim light that is the one I use, the always on mode and the strong light sensor mode. I been buying solar lights for over a year now, after I bought my first set to put on my fence oh I loved it so much, that after that I just keep buying now my backyard is like day doesn’t matter how dark it is I have light. Overall this light is amazing, easy to install, very bright, it has a big built in solar panel. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: C. LaRosa

customer_reviews.title: Great little light with easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Nifty little light! I bought this light to mount to light up a dark area of my back yard walkway. We don't access this area of the house much, but we like to have light there for security. This motion sensored solar light is perfect to get that job done. It is especially easy to install since its fully solar powered with no cables to worry about. There are several different modes but we chose the motion sensor mode that triggers only with motion and saves the battery power. There is no need for us to have the light on all night.
customer_reviews.author: Foreverjaded

customer_reviews.title: Light great but doesn't work in rain
customer_reviews.text: Loved this light over our garage door until it stopped working after a few months. Won't hold a charge anymore. Motion triggers it still, but it flashes on and then off and stays off. Disappointed. LATER ADDED: Once the dry season hit the light started working again and has been fine the past year except when there's heavy rain.
customer_reviews.author: LoupGarouBooks

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I like these solar motion lights. They seem sturdy and well made. Easy to install. Provide very soft yet bright light. After the first one was in place, I ordered two more for various locations around the perimeter of our house. I installed one in the back yard and it now provides light, as needed, for using the BBQ grill at night. One negative comment is that since I installed on the facia board (just under roof line) the motion detector is ultra sensitive and seems to pick up motion from tree branches when it is windy. The light tends to come on even though there is not human or animal movement.
customer_reviews.author: Tim T.

customer_reviews.title: A pretty decent light for the price
customer_reviews.text: I sent the first one of these back because it only worked about 10 X in a night, the replacement I got was exactly the same, so before I got around to sending it back about two months had gone by and it seems like this light learned how to stay on and the charge holds all night now and is plenty strong in the morning. I don't know if this is normal but I am very pleased with it. The light is truly amazing, I never have to think about it, it just always comes on when I need it. I will be buying a couple more of them for around the house, it does everything as advertised
customer_reviews.author: orionx19

customer_reviews.title: Keep it away from snow
customer_reviews.text: I have two similar lights from a different manufacturer, both of which work extremely well. The main difference between them and this one is that the solar panel on the first two is sloped, thus collects very little snow, however on this current one the solar panel is flat, thus making it a magnet for snow. I would like to install this one in a more sheltered place, but then it probably wouldn't get enough sun. Hopefully these will work better once the snowy season is over.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great light, very bright
customer_reviews.text: thrilled with this purchase. installed over shed doors in area that gets full sun all day (and would be expensive to run proper electric to location). this light is very bright when on full setting; I have it set for always on at nighttime and it runs at half-brightness until motion is detected and then it goes to full brightness. great light, simple to install, great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: TLH

customer_reviews.title: My 13 year old Collie loves it
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought was not so good. Contacted the seller and they replaced it FREE OF CHARGE! As far as the seller goes???? THE BEST! They made it hassle free to replace. I will now SEEK THIS SELLER OUT to buy from them! This light has literally saved my old Collie from missing the stairs at night, causing him to fall. The light has a terrific range and I love the 3 different modes. I live in S. Oregon and just went through complete devastation with the wildfires. And then, because it's Oregon...It has rained. My dog's little light is still going strong, even with 16 days of dark, orange skies. I Love It
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: My First Solar Sensor Light! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this light for front of my garage and it works fantastic. I installed it directly nearby the walk way to help me to see the surround area better when I walk into the house. The light sensor detects any movement and immediately turns the light on. For the price, you will get a sensor light without the need of changing battery or connect to a power source, so convenience! It is also really easy to install as you don't even need to look at any instructions to install it. I don't have anything to complain up to now and would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a solar sensor light.
customer_reviews.author: Nanabell

customer_reviews.title: Must have in the desert!
customer_reviews.text: My dad is having a manufactured home put on some of our property that will be his forever home. He is 70 years old, so lighting the outside where he walks is important. I got this solar light to put by his front door so he can see his key to unlock his door to get in his house. I love that this is waterproof and made of rustproof stainless steel+ABS material. The first try of charging the battery that comes already installed failed. Came to find out whoever put the light together, put the batter in backwards. I was afraid the battery would be damaged but it wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Twix

customer_reviews.title: Great light for a dark door
customer_reviews.text: I just received and installed my light over a dark storage room door on the side of the house that gets no light at night. I set it to the mode 2 to come on with motion, then go off. The light is great, its just right to be able to see the door lock so I can get a key inserted. I like the cool white light. Motion detection seems to work within about 10 feet or so. Very easy to install. Drill holes and mount. The real test will be to see how long it lasts. If it fails prematurely, I'll revise my review and rating, but for now its 5 stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: My Porch Is Lit
customer_reviews.text: Walking up the path from my driveway to the front door is now always lit at night. To my amazement, it's always lit up when the motion sensing has turned on at night, so the battery is exceeding my expectations. And this is during winter time in Detroit, so there's hardly any sun at all. There will be no issue keeping the battery charged in the other seasons. I hate having to deal with dead batteries but this appears to be the perfect application, since the light only turns on at night and when it senses that someone needs light! Install it and forget about it.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Trombly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up and very bright
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the motion flood lights that used to light up my driveway before the fixture was damaged. This didn't require any wiring whatsoever. Just a single screw to secure it to the house and it has stayed in place so far without a problem. Its a very cool bright light, it looks nice aesthetically from the street and the motion activated or always on settings are great. The one issue is the motion sensing. Unless you are almost right below it, the light doesn't TV come on. That might change once we start getting more sunny weather to charge this, though.
customer_reviews.author: Mmcneil

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking lights
customer_reviews.text: I like these little lights a lot - I have 4 or 5 of the warm white version around the back yard; the light is not super-bright, but perfectly fine for lighting up a 10 x 10 area, and the quality of light is very pleasant - not cold and harsh like a lot of them. Wish the motion sensing was a little faster, but works fine. Had one of these fail after a couple months and the company replaced it without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mixerman23

customer_reviews.title: Great solution where no electricity is available
customer_reviews.text: Great solution where no electricity is available. Bought this unit (Daylight Color) for the back of my garage. Have it set to "motion detect only". Been walking up a staircase in the dark behind my garage for 15 years now. Wish this was available sooner. Great solution for a simple problem. Unit turns on when about 12-ft away from it. I have it mounted high up (about 10-ft). Light is plentiful and stays on for about a half a minute after motion stops. Light fades to full on and fades off. We'll see how it holds up with longevity. Update: Liked the unit so much bought the Warm-White output color a year later. Still great!
customer_reviews.author: cleary524

customer_reviews.title: Works great when properly charged
customer_reviews.text: Light works great, seems well made, comes with all mounting hardware and good operating instructions. Installed to use above our address number on the side of the house so it can be seen from the street at night, works perfect for this using the always on low light feature which lasts all night, this mode also changes to a bright light when detecting motion. The only issue we have had relates to sun exposure for charging, the solar panel is not angled very much, when installed it's almost 90 degrees to the wall it's mounted on, so its sun exposure is limited during the winter months when the sun isn't directly overhead as long.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy B.

customer_reviews.title: It did not work at all
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. Left in the sun for days and never once showed any life at all, in this case Light. Ordered a different light for the same application. Glen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light despite limited capabilities
customer_reviews.text: Finally got a chance to put these up tonight. It is a super bright light for its size and is going to work great over the grill on the back porch. Only complaint is its sensitivity to ambient light ..any light whatsoever in the close proximity causes the light to shut off . If there was a constant on with out motion detection or photocell it would be much better
customer_reviews.author: john salyards

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and function
customer_reviews.text: The quality and function of the light exceeded my expectations. I was doubtful of the light working well considering the low price. I was surprised. It was easy to install. I used two of these to light up the front of an exterior storage building. The brightness is perfect for highlighting the entrance. The lights get brighter when approaching the entrance. A daily charge is perfect to keeping the lights operational throughout the night. I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ball

customer_reviews.title: Provides Safety Light
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 sets to provide lighting along a long deck so we can use it at night and for safety and security. So far, it has proven to be the right choice. Light is on all night, no problems. Light is bright enough for late activities and provide security into the night. Install was easy and fast. Lights are well made and of strong construction. All three lights installed in less than five minutes. Couldn’t be more pleased. Only suggestion is maybe lower the cost?
customer_reviews.author: MrEd

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights!
customer_reviews.text: Great value, great construction. I screwed two of these into my wooden deck, and used construction adhesive to glue one to the cement step leading to my house, and one to the vinyl fence over the house number so it is visible at night. Great! Plastic exterior, but could be mounted almost anywhere. Includes rechargable (solar) battery.
customer_reviews.author: Graciebird

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: At first I couldn't get this light to turn on even after I knew that the battery was fully charged. But the seller was very prompt and responded with an answer. The trick is that the light has to be in a different or dark environment the first time you turn it on. If any light is coming into the solar panel, the light can't be switched on. This only applies for the first time you turn on the light. Works great after that.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: Bought and installed these a year ago to light up the sidewalk where streetlights don't shine. Mounting on stucco is a bit challenging to not have the drill wander while trying to maintain the correct hole distances. Tried different lighting modes, but the one that work the best for our application was to turn and stay on continuously during the night. The lights get plenty of direct sunlight during the day to pretty much stay illuminated all night. Not super-bright but now you can see where you are walking.
customer_reviews.author: W. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Solar motion detector
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this solar motion detector below a bird house that is on a very tall pole. It is near a corner fence that abuts a wooded area. Since we have a dog and it has to go out at night, having this light come right on keeps wild animals back from our fenced in yard. Living by a park we tend to have lots of coyotes, raccoons, etc. Feel much better not having that dark corner. Very pleased with this and will be buying another shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: So great I bought several more
customer_reviews.text: Like many reviewers on here, I was so impressed with this light that I ended up buying additional units to add to my home. This made a perfect addition to a detached garage where we didn't have the option to run wiring. Our small dog is still large enough to activate the motion sensor near his potty zone. Install was a snap - just using a drill and screwdriver. Hardest part of the process was finding the proper sun zones to make sure the solar panel keep charging. Highly recommend for anyone who needs a lighting solution but doesn't want to mess with running electrical!
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights!!! I live in a rural area w large lots and hardly any street lights. We put these on the side of our house to light up our water softening system and pool equipment in case we need to check it when dark outside and to light up the sides of the house. There is a dim light when walking towards the area and then a bright light when directly in front. I love the bright white light. 100% worth the price. I hope they last.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: You can tell it's nice because it's heavy
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this over my wife's garden beds so it lights up when the deer come a knockin'. They glance at it and don't really care much, but hey maybe it will annoy them one day and save a tomato or two from their lazy wrath. Oh yeah, the product is high quality and works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Dad of 8

customer_reviews.title: Excellent solar light
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best solar light I've purchased. I wanted a motion light I could easily attach to my dog pen. This went up in minutes. I was skeptical at first due to its small size, but very happy that evening when it went on. The light covered the entire pen and I love how sensitive the motion detector is. It lights up the moment my dogs enter the area. And I also love the way it goes into a "nightlight" mode after they're in the house. I plan on buying more to place around the property.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok light
customer_reviews.text: Motion detection is slooooow to react. I usually have walked past light before it turns the intensity up. Switched it to on all the time which by product estimates should last 8-10 hours. Try closer to 4. Panel in location to get full sunlight during the day to charge. If it's overcast, don't count on it charging or working that night. Off to find something better...
customer_reviews.author: Nim

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: I've placed this above the shed door and it illuminates the key area just before I open it at night. If you have a shed in the back of your yard that has no illumination, then this is perfect for you. Insulation was easy just screw in the back panel and slide the down, and you're done! I didn't expect this to be as bright as it was. It has settings for you to dim it down so it's always on or keep it at high illumination for only when there is motion.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Millerband

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright, variety of settings and wireless!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light for security and safety for my shed. I have several acres and there are some animals like coyotes around. This allows me to make sure there is nothing out there before I go near the shed. I don't have electricity out there so the only way I could have a light out there is if it's solar. It is nice and bright and has different setting. I have mine on dim that brightens when motion is detected. This is a great item to have. I'll be buying more to around the house next.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Wrye

customer_reviews.title: Good, inexpensive choice
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait to use them before reviewing them. They came fast, next day delivery, and were packaged well, no issues. They give choices of how to install, and because I didn’t want to drill, I decided to try extra strength double sticky tape, so putting them up was a breeze. They work great, using the low light with motion sensor if something comes around. Just what I wanted. Thinking of another for the back door.
customer_reviews.author: krdenney

customer_reviews.title: Good Light with good support
customer_reviews.text: Light worked well for six months. Stayed on throughout the night at dim setting and came on very bright whenever motion was detected. Unfortunately it suddenly stopped working after a storm. It just flickered during the day and did not come on at night. Tried resetting it but nothing worked. Even though I had had it for over six months iThird sent me a new one. Everything is back to normal again with good lighting at night.
customer_reviews.author: David Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Great option!
customer_reviews.text: We really like how this is working so far. We didn't have power outside our back door and used a motion sensor lightbulb in a nearby light that we didn't like. This one seems to a great balance with the dim always on and brighter motion detected mode. It also seems less sensitive to our hanging plants during windy nights which means we pay more attention to when it goes on. All around happy with this so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dena Bee

customer_reviews.title: The best solar LED light
customer_reviews.text: I like solar lights because they help save electricity. I did buy so many kinds of solar lights to make my house and garden bright at night. Last time, I bought the circle solar light. But when my husband saw this solar light at his cousin's house, he fell in love with it and asked me to order it as I have Prime membership. It works great, charge quickly and very bight at night. It is compact and easy to install. Both of us are happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nguyen Thi Phuong Uyen

customer_reviews.title: The solar light's motion sensor works great and it's very bright
customer_reviews.text: The area by my sidedoor is very dark at night therefore hard to access at night although it's more convenient than the frontdoor after I park my car. With this solar light, I no longer have to walk around the house to enter through the frontdoor. The solar light's motion sensor works great and it's very bright. Now, not I can access my sidedoor at night, I also feel more secure at home knowing the lights can help scare unwanted guests away.
customer_reviews.author: Hbbhgg

customer_reviews.title: better than I thought it's be
customer_reviews.text: When I got the lights, they were a little smaller than I thought they would be but once I got them charged, I was surprised how bright they were. I put two above my garage so they light up when we pull our cars in the driveway and also to warn anyone messing around too. I put the others in the backyard, one above my shed doors and the other beside my entry gate. They look great and I put them on the on "all the time mode" and they are still running the next morning!
customer_reviews.author: dave porter

customer_reviews.title: Lights up the darkness
customer_reviews.text: I've got a long yard and at the end is a shed. While there are lights in the shed, they don't turn on until I roll up the door. But from the house to the shed it can get pretty dark. This light has made it much easier for me to make my way back to the boonies of my yard. I also like it because I have dogs and I can see when they are back by the shed because the light turns on. Will probably be ordering a few more!
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Has blinking issues when charging
customer_reviews.text: These are OK, except for one major problem. After a cloudy/rainy day and if they run completely out that night, the next day when they try to charge, they blink as they try to charge from dead to charging and you can't turn them to off with the mode/power button. This causes them to not charge well while blinking most the day. Fix requires taking them apart to remove battery and then re-install to force them to turn off. Then charge them, then turn back on. A real hassle after cloudy/rainy days. Would not recommend these based on this issue alone. Update: company offerered free replacement lights. Seem to be working better so far. Good customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good WHEN working!
customer_reviews.text: Have two of these and both have intermittent problems. They suddenly stop working and I have to open them up wiggle the positive side of the battery connection with a screwdriver. Everything looks fine and shows no sign of a loose connection or cold solder connection , but by just wiggling the connection it starts working again.....strange! UPDATE: Seller sent me a brand new one! Will see if this one keeps working......
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: A bright outdoor lights with stainless steel finishing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this iThird Solar Powered Security Lights for my side yard, which has no electronic outlet. This iThird light is a perfect solution for me. It is not the cheapest, but it is one of the brightest and does its job well. Its stainless steel finishing is beautiful. An important tip for other owner, if you have a hard-time to set its light mode, just take it to a dark room or outdoor or cover its solar panel, that you should easily set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Shey

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a camera and very bright.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for over a month now and still works great. I have it attached to the side of my house with the screws they've provided. It does charge even on cloudy days. These are very bright and look like a camera. That provided us a little more security. I use it so I can see my dog late at night. Sensor is good, even lights up when rabbits hop by. I am going to buy more to add to my fence.
customer_reviews.author: SharkBytes

customer_reviews.title: Bright light.
customer_reviews.text: I use the dim + sensor mode. It says the device will only turn 160 times a night for 37 seconds before going back to dim. It works good. Not too bright in dim mode, but it is noticeable. Once full brightness is on, there is a huge difference. The manual says 16 ft sensor range, but mine was able to go further. Passing cars on the street would trigger it and they would slow down, so this is a win for me.
customer_reviews.author: Android Zulu

customer_reviews.title: Durable outdoor solar light
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the outdoor solar light for 3 months now and it is still working great. I installed it as a step light for my front door. It is really helpful since our door steps kind of hidden and the front door light cannot sensor our motion at the time. I haven’T changed the batteries yet but so far it doesn’t have any problem. I would recommend this solar light for anyone that need an extra great outdoor light.
customer_reviews.author: Anh Pham

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful lights. I have a couple in my enclosed backyard to help my dogs see eat night. Motion detection is wonderfully sensitive and the light is bright enough to cover nearly the entire enclosure. Place them statically to maximum coverage. Easy peasy setup and had held up nicely to the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Corey L. Greene

customer_reviews.title: If I can install it, anyone can! Super easy.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy install! I’m horrible when it comes to installing anything and this was a breeze! The light works really well, nice and bright but not harsh on the eyes. I put this on my fence and it brightens up my yard perfectly. It even detected a cat on my fence at 4am a good 12 feet away or so, so I definitely know it’s working, my security camera picked that up. I hope it lasts a long time! Great little investment.
customer_reviews.author: WhatTheFluff

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Instead of having to go through a big install of an outdoor light, this solar powered light was a great alternative! We use it to light up a dark section of our driveway which makes walking up the driveway at night less scary. The kids have also been using the light to play basketball which has been great! We’re lucky we get plenty of sun on our back deck to keep the light charged!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Valentino

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: I bought in the winter and waited until spring to install. I installed on the side of my house in a fenced in area for garbage cans, firewood, etc. I just assumed that it was working, but just now verified that it is not. I would like a replacement unit. Will try.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Jiracek

customer_reviews.title: Love the soft white but sensor is not sensitive enough
customer_reviews.text: Its very hard to find a soft white solar light (not daylight or bright white) and that is why I love these. They give off a lot of light as well and all of mine are still in working order. BUT compared to the other solar lights I have bought these dont tend to come on until you have already walked past them. I have tried moving them higher, moving them lower, waving my arms before I pass it... it is just plain slow to come on. With the fact that it "fades" on adds to the delay as well. So in the end, love the soft white but hate that it comes on past when I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P. Baehl

customer_reviews.title: Good light for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these, one for the driveway and the other side walkway. Instructions were okay but did not say what size drill bit to use to make the initial hole. Secondly I wish there was an outline to make the holes. Other than that installation was easy and quicker on the 2nd. The sensor does not track incoming from more then 2ft. away and the light is not bright enough for the driveway- you need two for this area.
customer_reviews.author: dodgerboy

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, Adjustable modes. FYI: ambient light from other sources will prevent motion trigger.
customer_reviews.text: I like these lights but have not had them long enough to speak to the durability yet. The only issue i had was with outdoor security light on our power pole (which does not provide enough like to see well enough to get the key in the back door) which evidently was too much light for the motion sensor to be triggered. I thought something was wrong with the light until I tested in other areas. When I contacted the manufacturer (before I tested at another location) they immediately replaced them. Since they were not damaged really. I will keep and pay for the extras send.
customer_reviews.author: Kassiew

customer_reviews.title: Works great but...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these lights, one started flickering during the day, not long after installing it, and was not holding power for night. I contacted Amazon and the seller and finally I got a refund for the unit which is not working anymore, and I am going to buy another one to replace the faulty one.
customer_reviews.author: Octavian

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: I've had these lights for over a year and they are still burning bright. I won't buy from anyone else. I just added an additional light and will continue to add to my collection. I HIGHLY recommend! Thank you for putting out such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Dorschner

customer_reviews.title: Great solar light
customer_reviews.text: I have an area on the side of my house that is very dark, but no electrical wiring near that area. I did not want to pay an electrician $200 to put a wired security light. So I got this solar light and it works great. I love that I dont have to wire anything and that I save on my electrical bill. The light seems to last all night. Love it and plan to buy more to put around my house.
customer_reviews.author: Google

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for thefirst year or so.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first year. Fairly bright for where I have it. I use it as a light to fill the dark area on my walk way pointing to the door so the movement sensor turns it on as you get to the dark area. Sensor has a little delay, a little more then I like but still livable. Seems to only work when it wants to now. Haven't really looked at it to see whats going on. It would of been 5 stars had it not started to bugger up.
customer_reviews.author: Jaygyver

customer_reviews.title: Good for going from car to house at night.
customer_reviews.text: It’s very dark outside my girlfriends house at night. Bought this so that she can feel safer and have light on her as she goes from her car to her home. Seems like it should last but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Landon Ostler

customer_reviews.title: Great light!
customer_reviews.text: We have a dark area at the side of our townhouse and two of these really light it up. I was concerned about my neighbor, but she loves it as well when she lets her little dog out at night. Works great so far and doesn't need direct sunlight to charge up. I am using it on the motion setting...it was very easy to set up...just push the button!
customer_reviews.author: J. Riggleman

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: The best solar light I have used. It can be use anywhere outside the house. It is easy to install, no crew needed if you have something to hang on or you can use double side tape. This product has an incredibly bright white color which can see something further. The sensor works very well within 5 meters. I bought it for my parents and installed by the door in case they have to step out sometime when outside is dark.
customer_reviews.author: Yung

customer_reviews.title: Compact but Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased and returned several other lights because the lumens were too weak. I took one more chance and ordered this one based on positive reviews. It installed in about two minutes and was fully operational. When I tested it that night, the bright light illuminated the driveway and path. It was so great that I've ordered another one for the back door. I can highly recommend this outdoor light to anyone seeking an inexpensive and easy to install lighting system.
customer_reviews.author: World Music Lover

customer_reviews.title: Lights
customer_reviews.text: Love these. We have them above all our windows. ...Update we do have thes above all of our windows and doors when we first installed these lights they were perfect. We wanted the windows lit up.But lately they only light up the area directly.around the light they dont really light up the window. Kinda sucks because we have installed them above all windows and doors and still have to use a flashlight when taking the puppy outside. I would look for something stronger.
customer_reviews.author: julie s.

customer_reviews.title: Worked only when we didn't need it too
customer_reviews.text: Argh I wanted to love this but it barely worked. Batteries were already installed upon opening. Maybe it was re-used? I dont know but it worked when we didn't need it too 🤦🏼‍♀️ Maybe it needs the sun directly on it for a longer amount of time? We face N so that's probably why...
customer_reviews.author: Stickie

customer_reviews.title: Just right for our path.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic little light. Extremely bright and stays on just long enough to illuminate the stairs for our older dog. We got two. Even the one that is partially shaded most of the day still lights up brightly for as long as is needed. I like that you can set it to on or auto easily from underneath without having to remove it. Very easy to install as well.
customer_reviews.author: JTACorwyn

customer_reviews.title: Withstood hailstorm, work great and highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one for above my garage and loved it so much I bought a second for the sidewalk leading to the front door. I’ve had them 3-4 months. Both are south facing and are set to be on dim and are easily triggered to brighten. They work perfectly and withstood a hailstorm that totaled my roof (large gumball size with ping pong mixed in). Even if it is cloudy during the day they still light at night. I’ve gone out front at 3am and they were still lit. Super easy to install, comes with screws.
customer_reviews.author: Meag86

customer_reviews.title: Good light for spots away from accessible power or subject to outages
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Nice looking fixture, bright, good motion sensing distance. Lights fade on/off. I was impressed enough to buy more. Cons: Absolutely horrible installation screws included with the fixture. You need to use your own or be annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: John Haselsberger

customer_reviews.title: Functionally very good. Asthetically it's ok
customer_reviews.text: Excellent output for a small panel and perfect warm white light that is bright. Lasts longer than a lot of my other solar lights. One thing I don't like is the ugly face with the lame logo. The whole casing looks slick except it's garish styling on front. Lol. Since I find it ugly but it works good I'm just using it as wall wash light... So it's facing away from people and it looks pretty cool actually so it's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it worked exactly the way I wanted it to - Perfect. However
customer_reviews.text: I have not had this long enough to really comment on this, but when I first installed it, it worked exactly the way I wanted it to - Perfect. However, I have just noticed that the light is NOT coming on now when it senses movement. I'm not sure if it is because for the past 2 days we have had nothing but rain and overcast sky, or is it that it has just failed completely. I will wait until after we get a couple of days of sun again to see if it begins to work. If I discover that it has failed completely, I obviously will be changing my review and looking for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Works well BUT...
customer_reviews.text: The only fly in this product, is that the motion sensor is TOO SENSITIVE! Now I hung this over my front door, it's small bright and works great for a so small a unit for the job. BUT the motion detection will pick up the RED tail lights on the road 100 FEET AWAY and trigger the light!!! In the spring I will make a plastic wedge for it to "pull in" the line of sight of the motion detector. Other then that I like it and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Poe

customer_reviews.title: Quality,settings
customer_reviews.text: Has different light settings so its good to go every night. Motion detection works great. Not the brightest but it's bright enough. I drilled it by the front door. >Make sure sun light hits it enough or it won't fully charge. I had it under my tree where the sun would only partially hit it & it would hardly ever turn on, but now it works great.Overall awesome light, good quality
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Lara

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied!  My smaller motion activated  light stays charged and has a brighter light.r
customer_reviews.text: I should of never taken the solar light that was up there down. It was three years old and was great! Put this one up and it does not work half as good as the one I had up first. Not what I expected. Going to put my older one back up! thanks so
customer_reviews.author: Nancie

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for about 3 months and it has exceeded my expectations. I needed a light to unlock my gate when I come home in the dark and I don't like leaving my lights on outside bc I live in south Florida and the bugs are horrendous! This motion sensor activated light works perfect for what I needed and I save on energy costs too.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine :)

customer_reviews.title: Great light. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Great light! Great customer service. I installed this light near an entryway and it worked brilliantly. It was so sensitive to motion if I even opened the blinds in the house it would turn on the light. Sadly six days after the return window it went into seizure mode and then stopped working. I hoped it was just a fluke because I loved the light. I contacted the seller through Amazon and immediately a new one showed up! Very satisfied with the light and the excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Birches

customer_reviews.title: Terrible instructions, cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions between the mounting holes listed in the instructions were completely off. Wish I had measured the actual holes on the product before I drilled into the siding of my house. Now I have extra holes on the side of my house which is disappointing. The light itself works but seems very cheap so I'm not sure how durable it will be. Would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ms

customer_reviews.title: Bright and provides security with the motion sensor
customer_reviews.text: This solar light is so awesome. I installed it in front of our garage. Now we always have a light there at night and it looks amazingly bright. It matches up well with our outdoor hardware since it is stainless steel. It has a motion sensor so if anyone comes by it will turn on nice and bright. I am so glad it provides that extra sense of security.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Mel

customer_reviews.title: Good things come in small  Packages
customer_reviews.text: Good things come in small packages.. Perfect lighting for our shed. There are 3 light selections, we chose motion detection only, that thg way it doesn't keep us up all night. Love this out door light. It's well made, durable with the perfect amount if light. Easy installation, easy to understand instruction. Easy peasy...
customer_reviews.author: DL J.

customer_reviews.title: Strong light for its size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to light up my driveway between two houses. I was surprised at how bright this little light was once installed!! My deck is off the side of this light on the opposite house (my neighbor let me install this on his house for our security) and when I walk out of my back door this light still catches my motion. It’s perfect for my needs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kash

customer_reviews.title: A great sensor light with very useful design.
customer_reviews.text: It is the product I have been dreaming to have. I keep on searching the solar motion sensor light for my outside door for a long time. Finally, the old ones could be replaced by those great lights. It makes my life much easy. I can work outside during night and need not to worry about turning off light. In addition, this light has adjustable modes and water- and rust-proof. It was mounted very easily on my porch ceiling. A great sensor light with very useful design.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Really bright light
customer_reviews.text: This light is super bright. We hung on our 4 ft high fence to let us see our dogs in the back corner. The motion sensor picks up our Shelties within about 10 feet. They are usually moving fast, so the distance is hard to judge. The motion sensor range might be better if it were mounted higher. The light starts low and brightens, which I like, so it doesn’t blind the dogs’ eyes. This has been used for about 2 months without problems. It worked so well I bought a second one. Rain hasn’t affected performance. I will update after winter cold and limited sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn't hold charge
customer_reviews.text: I got this product and thought I'd be writing 5 stars. Bright light, stylish, what could go wrong besides maybe replacing it once a year or so do to weather wear and tear.Works great for about an hour or 2 most. Charges all day in direct sun light only to work about 2 hours at most after dusk then its completely dead. Thought maybe it was a fluke but after 4 days of it charging just to repeat it not working after an hour its ethier detective or a bad product. Won't buy again, will look at a different company
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 nights and then died.
customer_reviews.text: This came charged and for 2 nights, I was very pleased with it. I used the motion detecting setting, so it was not on very long. It was positioned in a place that it received full sun, so that wasn't the issue. I also tried taking it down and deliberately putting it out in the sun to charge - no dice. I missed the return window, so I strongly advise that this light not be purchased until one is ready to get it in service and test it well because there are great experiences and then there are duds like mine.
customer_reviews.author: LeanneP

product_meta.title: Solar Lights Outdoor Motion Sensor, iThird LED Solar Powered Security Lights Stainless Steel for Yard Patio Garage Waterproof 3 Modes Super Bright(Daylight)
feature_bullets: 【3 Adjustable Modes Motion Activated Solar Security Light】 Sensor&Dim Light Mode: the lights will stay on dim when no motion detected and then turn on bright when motion detected; Sensor Mode: Stay off when no motion detected and then turn on bright when motion detected; Always On Mode: Stay on dim all night

【Eco-friendly & Energy-saving Solar Wall Lights】 Dusk to dawn outdoor motion sensor lights. Replace for 10W led bulbs, save $250; for 12W CFL bulbs, save $300; for 60 watt incandescent bulb, save $1500($0.5/KWh) in whole lifespan. Perfect for garage fences garden yard lawn landscape porch attic driveway pathway pool etc.When motion is detected it provides max-brightness illumination for security and safety protection for your property all night

【Waterproof & Rustproof Motion Sensor Lighting】 It is waterproof(IP44) and could survived for all kinds of severe weather, Made of rustproof stainless steel+ABS material, it won't get rust and become fragile under sunshine
【Solar Motion Light Parameter】Stainless steel; 5V 2W more efficient solar panel; Charging Time: 4-6H; Work Time: 8-12H; Maximum Luminous: 330LM; Daylight 6000K-6500K; Sensor Distance: up to 16.4FT

【Solar Motion Sensor Light Outdoor】 As solar lights built-in photocell sensor and the unit is shipped in the OFF setting, the light won't turn on when you press the mode button under bright ambient. Please adjust the mode of light under dark ambient or cover the solar panels before installed

specifications.Special Features: Eco-friendly & Energy-saving Solar Lights Outdoor;, Dusk to Dawn Solar Outdoor Lights; 3 Adjustable Modes Solar Security Lights;, Solar Outdoor Wall Lights: Maximum Luminous: 330LM; Daylight 6000K-6500K, [WARNING]As the light was built-in photocell sensor, it won't light up when you press the mode button in a bright ambient, please check the light in dark place. We are trying to update our products with printed logo, some old inventories may not have our logo on the body and they are the same except printed logo.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,874 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
